english: you need to make a promise
I want you to make a promise

chinese: 我不想要你做一个承诺
english: I  don't  want  you  to  make  a promise
you need to keep the promise

chinese: 你不能遵守的这个承诺
我不想要你做一个承诺
english: I  don't  want  you  to  make  a promise

chinese: 我不想要你做一个你不能遵守，的承诺
english: I  don't  want  you  to  make  a promise you can't keep

chinese: 当你（现在）正在钓鱼的时候
你必须保持安静当你（现在），正在钓鱼的时候
english: you  have  to  keep  quiet  when you are fishing

chinese: 你必须保守我们的秘密
english: you have to keep our secret

chinese: 她不可以保守一个秘密
她不可以保守一个秘密五分钟
english: she can't keep a secret for five minutes

chinese: 她（过去）说她不可以保守一，个秘密五分钟
english: she said she can't keep a secret for five minutes

chinese: 在工作和生活之间保持一个好，的平衡
english: to keep a good balance between work and life

chinese: 你必须在工作和生活之间保持，一个好的平衡
english: you  have  to  keep  a  good balance between work and life

chinese: 在工作和生活之间保持一个好，的平衡
english: to keep a good balance between work and life

chinese: 在工作和生活之间保持一个好，的平衡（它）是困难的
english: it  is  difficult  to  keep  a  good balance between work and life

chinese: 在工作和生活之间保持一个好，的平衡（它）是非常困难的
english: it is very difficult to keep a good balance between work and life

chinese: 我（过去）告诉你对于那件事，保持沉默
english: I told you to keep quiet about it

chinese: 对于我的计划保持沉默
english: to keep quiet about my plan

chinese: 我（过去）告诉你对于我的计，划保持沉默
english: I told you to keep quiet about my plan

chinese: 你（过去）承诺对于我的计划，保持沉默
english: you  promised  to  keep  quiet about my plan
I want you to promise me
you will not tell him the truth

chinese: 我想要你承诺我你将不会告诉，他真相
english: I want you to promise me you will not tell him the truth

chinese: 我想要你承诺我你将绝不会告，诉他真相
english: I want you to promise me you will never tell him the truth
